Operation 'post-getOnboardingUrl' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks critical details about what inputs are required (account holder reference, configuration), what the response contains (redirect URL format), and important side effects (single-use nature, validity scope). Added specificity about request requirements, response format, and session behavior to improve AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

data.current_summary: Get a link to a Adyen-hosted onboarding page
data.current_description: Returns a link to an Adyen-hosted onboarding page (HOP) that you can send to your account holder. For more information on how to use HOP, refer to [Hosted onboarding](https://docs.adyen.com/classic-platforms/onboard-users/hosted-onboarding-page).
data.summary_suggestion: Generate hosted onboarding page link for account holder
data.description_suggestion: Generates a unique link to an Adyen-hosted onboarding page (HOP) that you can send to your account holder to complete their onboarding. Requires the account holder's reference and other onboarding configuration details in the request. Returns a redirect URL that remains valid for the onboarding session. The generated link is single-use and account holder-specific.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks critical details about what inputs are required (account holder reference, configuration), what the response contains (redirect URL format), and important side effects (single-use nature, validity scope). Added specificity about request requirements, response format, and session behavior to improve AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

message: Operation 'post-getPciQuestionnaireUrl' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description is too minimal and lacks essential context for AI agent decision-making. Missing details about: required inputs (account holder reference), response format (redirect URL), prerequisite conditions (partner platform setup requirement), and the questionnaire's role in onboarding. Enhanced description clarifies the partner platform requirement upfront, specifies inputs/outputs, and explains the operational context to improve agent interpretability.

data.current_summary: Get a link to a PCI compliance questionnaire
data.current_description:
Returns a link to a PCI compliance questionnaire that you can send to your account holder.
 > You should only use this endpoint if you have a [partner platform setup](https://docs.adyen.com/classic-platforms/platforms-for-partners).
data.summary_suggestion: Generate PCI compliance questionnaire link for partner platform
data.description_suggestion: Generates a link to a PCI compliance questionnaire that you can send to your account holder for completion. This endpoint is exclusively for partner platform setups. Requires the account holder's reference in the request. Returns a redirect URL to the hosted questionnaire. The link enables account holders to complete their PCI compliance assessment as part of the onboarding process.
data.reasoning: Original description is too minimal and lacks essential context for AI agent decision-making. Missing details about: required inputs (account holder reference), response format (redirect URL), prerequisite conditions (partner platform setup requirement), and the questionnaire's role in onboarding. Enhanced description clarifies the partner platform requirement upfront, specifies inputs/outputs, and explains the operational context to improve agent interpretability.

data.current_summary: Get a link to a Adyen-hosted onboarding page
data.current_description: Returns a link to an Adyen-hosted onboarding page (HOP) that you can send to your account holder. For more information on how to use HOP, refer to [Hosted onboarding](https://docs.adyen.com/classic-platforms/onboard-users/hosted-onboarding-page).
data.summary_suggestion: Generate hosted onboarding page link for account holder
data.description_suggestion: Generates a unique link to an Adyen-hosted onboarding page (HOP) that you can send to your account holder to complete their onboarding. The request requires account holder identification and onboarding configuration details. Returns a URL that can be shared with the account holder, along with a unique reference identifier. The generated link is valid for a limited time and can only be used once per account holder.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks critical details about inputs (what account holder information is needed), outputs (what fields are returned), and side effects (link validity, single-use nature). Added specificity about request requirements, response structure, and link behavior to improve AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.
